name: FriendSpace
description:
A game made for Ludum Dare 40 "The more you have, the worse it is"

Signup for FriendSpace today, and enjoy all the benefits of having friends! Seeing them at the store, buying them gifts, getting presents! The more FriendSpace you have, the worse better it is!

Controls
  • Menu Interaction - Mouse
  • Menu Close - X or Escape
  • Move - WASD or Arrows
  • World Interact - E
  • Rotate Camera - Mouse
Pro-Tips
  • If you would like to be included in the High Score List please put your Ludum Dare Username into the game (In retrospect it should have asked for it at the end, not the beginning ^_^).
  • The timer in the shop will let you know when present production is going to stop, you can still buy lava lamps online and give them to your friends at the store though!
  • After you have bought presents for the year, go back home and sleep in your bed.
  • Your friendships will strengthen or be hurt by the presents you get your friends:
    • no present hurts your friendship
    • the wrong present has no effect
    • the correct present has positive effect on the friendship
    • and of course a lava lamp will grow it even more ^_^
  • There is an ending to the game, a hint for finding it: It doesn’t have much to do with your friends, if they are getting to be too much to manage. ^_^
